# Measure

# Measure

Represents a single measure as part of a musical piece in musical notation.

Kind: global class

  • Measure
    • new Measure([maxDuration])
    • .noteSets
    • .duration
    • .duration
    • .changeSet(set, i)
    • .pushSet(notes)
    • .pushSets(noteSets)

# new Measure([maxDuration])

Creates a Measure instance

Param Type Default Description
[maxDuration] Number 0 Max duration of the measure(decided by time signature)

# measure.noteSets

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.duration

get the duration

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.duration

set the duration

Kind: instance property of Measure

# measure.changeSet(set, i)

Change notes somewhere inside a measure

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
set Array The new set.
i Number The index of the set to replace with.

# measure.pushSet(notes)

Push notes to a measure

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
notes Array array of notes

# measure.pushSets(noteSets)

Add sets to the end of the measure

Kind: instance method of Measure

Param Type Description
noteSets Array array of sets
